Synthesia AI Review 2026

AI Video Generation with Avatars

What is Synthesia?

Synthesia is an AI video generation platform that creates professional videos using AI avatars. Simply type your script, choose an avatar, and Synthesia generates a video in minutes - no camera, studio, or actors needed.
